name: Palewood
description:
A small horror game

When her little brother wanders into a dying forest, Cavi has to rescue him from the monsters who reside there.

Disclaimer: Contains disturbing and gorey imagery. 

  • ~15 min of gameplay
  • Avoid monsters
  • Explore the pale forest

Controls:

WASD - Move

  • SPACE - Struggle
  • E - Interact
  • ESC - Pause

If you enjoyed the game, please consider sharing it, it helps a lot :>
Also consider joining my Discord server!
